frontmatter.title: Never Forget
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Only their eyes showed they were alive. Grey matted hair, ashen clothes and faces: the dead appeared to rise up from the subway. They came in waves.

frontmatter.title: Gotta Start Somewhere
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Now the flip side is of the same question, “What would I invest my next 10 years doing? If I am spending the next 10 years developing a skill, day in and day out, what skill would that be? What would I want?

frontmatter.title: Tithing: Should You Pay On Your Gross or Net Income?
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Tithing: Should You Pay On Your Gross or Net Income? The next time someone shares the “gross or net blessings” argument, share this with them . . .
frontmatter.hero_alt: Tithing: Should You Pay On Your Gross or Net Income?

frontmatter.title: What Should You Pay Tithing On?
frontmatter.author: James M. Dahle, MD
frontmatter.short: The only discussions I ever see in both Sunday school classes or on the internet seem to center around the gross versus net question. I suspect I have spent more time thinking about tithing than anyone else on the planet. We’ll dive deep into the topic and discuss some questions you’ve probably had and probably a few you’ve never thought about.
frontmatter.hero_alt: What Should You Pay Tithing On?

frontmatter.author: Rho Lall

frontmatter.title: Books Are Unsustainable
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Video games, said Burton, is where kids are going to absorb the myths of our culture.  The old model of creating books from trees is not sustainable. He urges the audience to embrace digital media.  He speaks about the power of visual media and the power of video games.  Moving pictures and sounds can tell a story on multiple levels, conscious and unconscious.

frontmatter.title: Happy Birthday!
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: This might not be for everyone, but it is more likely for you since we are friends. I took up this challenge on my birthday and now I’m challenging you!

frontmatter.title: God Calls to You
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Yet, no matter your history—if you have faltered, failed, feel broken, bitter, betrayed, or beaten—know that you are not alone. God still calls to you.

frontmatter.title: Out of Small Things
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Perhaps you don’t consider yourself all that useful; perhaps you don’t consider yourself a blessing in somebody’s life.

frontmatter.title: “all things shall work together for your good.”
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Though the righteous fall seven times, they rise again.
frontmatter.hero_alt: “all things shall work together for your good.”

frontmatter.title: How much value is there in fixing the world?
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: . . .  if the people around us are falling apart  . . .  and we don’t notice?
frontmatter.hero_alt: How much value is there in fixing the world?

frontmatter.title: Preparing a Noble Death
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Love your life, perfect your life, beautify all things in your life. Seek to make your life long and its purpose in the service of your people. Prepare a noble death

frontmatter.title: How can two truths exist at the same time if they conflict?
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short:
The saying goes: there are three truths: your truth, my truth, and the actual truth.
Meh.
frontmatter.hero_alt: How can two truths exist at the same time if they conflict?

frontmatter.title: Instincts. An inner guidance system.
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Animals have baffled scientists with an amazing sense of direction and instinct for home. When scientists study this fascinating behavior, they ask questions such as “How do they know where to go?” and “How does each successive generation learn this behavior?”

frontmatter.title: Thanksgiving: An Attitude of Gratitude
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: This is a holiday about gratitude, about family and about possibility. It brings people together to celebrate the harvest, to look each other in the eye and share something magical.

frontmatter.title: I definitely want to pursue a PhD at some point, maybe.
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Is an MBA 16 times better than online coursework? It costs 16 times as much. No doubt it is better, but 16 times better?
frontmatter.hero_alt: I definitely want to pursue a PhD at some point, maybe.

frontmatter.title: On the Fallibility of Modern Prophets.
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: The Lord will never permit the President of this Church to lead you astray. It is not in the mind of God. If I were to attempt that, the Lord would remove me out of my place.
frontmatter.hero_alt: On the Fallibility of Modern Prophets.

frontmatter.title: Biannual Bibliothon 2017 Blogger Book Tag
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: That is a hard one. I don’t read a lot of fiction so the list of potentials is literally, Harry Potter, & The Hunger Games. I am going to go with the small group of people who know what Covfefe’ means.

frontmatter.title: Is there Sunshine In Your Soul Today?
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: I often find it hard to sing sunny, bouncing, lyrics. This is the greatest talk I have heard in a long time
frontmatter.hero_alt: Is there Sunshine In Your Soul Today?

frontmatter.title: The Case for Alternative Facts
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Is there is such a thing as an alternative fact? Aren’t facts by definition true? If proven false then don’t they cease to be . . . fact?

frontmatter.title: Trumps Win Can Not Be Undone, For Me, It’s Become Personal
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Have I been kidding myself all along? I no longer . . . belong. Did i ever?
frontmatter.hero_alt: Trumps Win Can Not Be Undone, For Me, It’s Become Personal

frontmatter.title: #DENY270
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: We need to stop waiting on others to fix our problems. We need to stop holding our nose while we wait to see what our parties bring us. We need to be the outsider in Washington.

frontmatter.title: Respond In Meekness
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: To confuse them is to literally confuse a thoughtful response with failing to respond.

frontmatter.title: Two Facts I wish I knew when I was Just diagnosed with Papillary Thyroid Cancer.
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: My Dr. referred me to Dr. Amad two years ago, when I was first diagnosed with thyroid cancer. He ordered the PET scan. I asked why. His response chilled me: “Because I can’t look at your lungs with a sonogram.”
frontmatter.hero_alt: Two Facts I wish I knew when I was Just diagnosed with Papillary Thyroid Cancer.

frontmatter.title: Revile Mediocrity
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Saturday night, 12:30 a.m. I'm standing in front of a '15 Dodge Challenger Hellcat. The dealership is closed. I stopped by on my way home from the office, I'm alone with my thoughts.

frontmatter.title: I want to chat
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: So gmail has a chat feature that i wanted to explore.  You should get a gmail account.
